name: CRYEP
description: CRYEP is a hardcore two-dimensional action platformer that combines the genre of "rogue" and the mechanics of Contra. Actions take place in a parallel universe, year 3318. Go on an expedition and fight with alien enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: intel x86 family, 2Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: opengl 2.0 supported graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0
